file.name: swagger-api.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: EduSoho接口
  description: EduSoho接口，随版本动态变化
  version: default
paths:
  '/api/courses/{courseId}/live_replay/{liveId}':
    get:
      tags:
        - course
      summary: 课程自研直播任务回放下载接口
      description: 'VERSION >= 21.3.6'
      parameters:
        -
          name: courseId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: number
        -
          name: liveId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: number
      responses:
        '200':
          description: 回放下载接口
          content:
            application/vnd.edusoho.v2+json:
              schema:
                properties:
                  url: { description: 下载地址, type: string }
                  token: { description: token, type: string }
                  roomId: { description: roomId, type: number }
                  type: { description: 直播供应商类型, type: string, enum: [selfLive] }
                type: object
  '/api/courses/{courseId}/notes/{noteId}':
    get:
      tags:
        - course
      summary: 课程单个笔记获取接口
      responses:
        '200':
          description: 单条笔记
          content:
            application/vnd.edusoho.v2+json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/course.note'
  '/api/courses/{courseId}/notes':
    get:
      tags:
        - course
      summary: 课程多个笔记获取接口
      responses:
        '200':
          description: 多条笔记
          content:
            application/vnd.edusoho.v2+json:
              schema:
                properties:
                  data: { type: array, items: { $ref: '#/components/schemas/course.note' } }
                  paging: { $ref: '#/components/schemas/common.paging' }
                type: object
  '/api/courses/{courseId}/notes/{noteId}/like':
    post:
      tags:
        - course
      summary: 课程笔记点赞接口
      responses:
        '200':
          description: 笔记点赞回执
          content:
            application/vnd.edusoho.v2+json:
              schema:
                properties:
                  success: { title: success, type: boolean }
                type: object
    delete:
      tags:
        - course
      summary: 课程笔记取消点赞接口
      responses:
        '200':
          description: 笔记取消点赞回执
          content:
            application/vnd.edusoho.v2+json:
              schema:
                properties:
                  success: { title: success, type: boolean }
                type: object
  '/api/courses/{courseId}/threads/{id}':
    get:
      tags:
        - course
      summary: 获取单条问答/话题
      responses:
        '200':
          description: 获取课程话题
          content:
            application/vnd.edusoho.v2+json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/course.thread'
  /api/settings/signSecurity:
    get:
      tags:
        - setting
      summary: 获取接口加密设置
      responses:
        '200':
          description: 加密设置
          content:
            application/vnd.edusoho.v2+json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/setting.signSecurity'
  /api/settings/locale:
    get:
      tags:
        - setting
      summary: 获取系统语言设置
      responses:
        '200':
          description: 语言设置
          content:
            application/vnd.edusoho.v2+json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/setting.locale'
  /api/settings/ugc:
    get:
      tags:
        - setting
      summary: 获取UGC设置
      responses:
        '200':
          description: 全部UGC设置
          content:
            application/vnd.edusoho.v2+json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/setting.ugc'
  /api/settings/ugc_review:
    get:
      tags:
        - setting
      summary: 获取评价UGC设置
      responses:
        '200':
          description: 评价UGC设置
          content:
            application/vnd.edusoho.v2+json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/setting.ugc_review'
  /api/settings/ugc_note:
    get:
      tags:
        - setting
      summary: 获取笔记UGC设置
      responses:
        '200':
          description: 笔记UGC设置
          content:
            application/vnd.edusoho.v2+json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/setting.ugc_note'
  /api/settings/ugc_thread:
    get:
      tags:
        - setting
      summary: 获取话题问答UGC设置
      responses:
        '200':
          description: 话题问答UGC设置
          content:
            application/vnd.edusoho.v2+json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/setting.ugc_thread'
  /api/settings/ugc_private_message:
    get:
      tags:
        - setting
      summary: 获取私信UGC设置
      responses:
        '200':
          description: 私信UGC设置
          content:
            application/vnd.edusoho.v2+json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/setting.ugc_private_message'
  /api/settings/task_learning_config:
    get:
      tags:
        - setting
      summary: 任务学习设置
      responses:
        '200':
          description: 任务学习设置
          content:
            application/vnd.edusoho.v2+json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/setting.task_learning_config'
  /api/settings/user:
    get:
      tags:
        - setting
      summary: 用户设置
      responses:
        '200':
          description: 用户设置信息
          content:
            application/vnd.edusoho.v2+json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/setting.user'
components:
  schemas:
    course.note:
      title: course.note
      description: 课程笔记
      properties:
        id:
          title: id
          description: ID
          type: number
        userId:
          title: userId
          description: userId
          type: number
        taskId:
          title: taskId
          description: taskId
          type: number
        content:
          title: content
          description: content
          type: string
        length:
          title: length
          description: length
          type: number
        likeNum:
          title: likeNum
          description: likeNum
          type: number
        createdTime:
          title: createdTime
          description: 创建时间
          type: string
          format: datetime
        updatedTime:
          title: updatedTime
          description: 更新时间
          type: string
          format: datetime
        user:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/user.simple'
        like:
          $ref: '#components/schemas/course.note.like'
        task:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/course.task.public'
      type: object
    course.note.like:
      title: course.note.like
      description: 笔记点赞数据
      properties:
        id:
          title: id
          description: ID
          type: number
        noteId:
          title: noteId
          description: 笔记ID
          type: number
        userId:
          title: userId
          description: 点赞人ID
          type: number
        createdTime:
          title: createdTime
          description: 创建时间
          type: string
          format: datetime
      type: object
    course.task.public:
      title: course.task.public
      description: 课程任务
      properties:
        id:
          title: id
          description: ID
          type: number
        seq:
          title: seq
          description: 任务排序
          type: number
        categoryId:
          title: categoryId
          description: course_chapter.id
          type: number
        title:
          title: title
          description: 标题
          type: string
        isOptional:
          title: isOptional
          description: 是否选修
          type: number
        startTime:
          title: startTime
          description: 任务开始时间
          type: number
        endTime:
          title: endTime
          description: 任务截止时间
          type: number
        mode:
          title: mode
          description: 任务类型
          type: string
        status:
          title: status
          description: 任务状态
          enum:
            - create
            - published
            - unpublished
        number:
          title: number
          description: 课时序号
          type: number
        type:
          title: type
          description: 任务类型
          type: string
        mediaSource:
          title: mediaSource
          description: 媒体资源来源默认self
          type: string
        length:
          title: length
          description: 长度可以是考试时长音视频时长等
          type: number
      type: object
    course.thread:
      title: course.thread
      description: 课程话题、问答
      properties:
        id:
          title: ID
          description: ID
          type: number
        courseId:
          title: courseId
          description: 课程ID
          type: number
        taskId:
          title: taskId
          description: 任务ID
          type: number
      type: object
    setting.signSecurity:
      title: setting.signSecurity
      description: 接口安全加密设置信息
      properties:
        level:
          title: level
          description: 安全校验等级：close（不校验）、optional（佛系校验）、open（强制校验）
          type: string
          default: close
          enum:
            - close
            - optional
            - open
        clients:
          title: clients
          description: 需要校验的设备列表：包含ios、android、miniprogram、other
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
            enum:
              - ios
              - android
              - miniprogram
              - other
          default: null
      type: object
    setting.locale:
      title: setting.locale
      description: 语言信息
      properties:
        locale:
          title: locale
          description: '语言：en,zh_CN'
          type: string
          default: zh_CN
          enum:
            - en
            - zh_CN
      type: object
    setting.ugc_review:
      title: setting.ugc_review
      description: 评价UGC设定
      properties:
        enable:
          title: enable
          description: 评价总开关
          type: integer
          default: 1
        course_enable:
          title: course_enable
          description: 课程评价开关
          type: integer
          default: 1
        classroom_enable:
          title: classroom_enable
          description: 班级评价开关
          type: integer
          default: 1
        question_bank_enable:
          title: question_bank_enable
          description: 题库评价开关
          type: integer
          default: 1
        open_course_enable:
          title: open_course_enable
          description: 公开课评价开关
          type: integer
          default: 1
        article_enable:
          title: article_enable
          description: 资讯评论开关
          type: integer
          default: 1
      type: object
    setting.ugc_note:
      title: setting.ugc_note
      description: 笔记UGC设定
      properties:
        enable:
          title: enable
          description: 笔记总开关
          type: integer
          default: 1
        classroom_enable:
          title: classroom_enable
          description: 班级笔记开关
          default: 1
        course_enable:
          title: course_enable
          description: 课程笔记开关
          default: 1
      type: object
    setting.ugc_thread:
      title: setting.ugc_thread
      description: 话题讨论UGC设定
      properties:
        enable:
          title: enable
          description: 话题讨论总开关
          type: integer
          default: 1
        course_question_enable:
          title: course_question_enable
          description: 课程提问开关
          type: integer
          default: 1
        course_thread_enable:
          title: course_thread_enable
          description: 课程话题开关
          type: integer
          default: 1
        classroom_question_enable:
          title: classroom_question_enable
          description: 班级提问开关
          type: integer
          default: 1
        classroom_thread_enable:
          title: classroom_thread_enable
          description: 班级话题开关
          type: integer
          default: 1
        group_thread_enable:
          title: group_thread_enable
          description: 小组话题开关
          type: integer
          default: 1
      type: object
    setting.ugc_private_message:
      title: setting.ugc_private_message
      description: 私信UGC设定
      properties:
        enable:
          title: enable
          description: 私信总开关
          type: integer
          default: 1
        student_to_student:
          title: student_to_student
          description: 学员之间发送私信
          type: integer
          default: 1
        student_to_teacher:
          title: student_to_teacher
          description: 学员向老师发送私信
          type: integer
          default: 1
        teacher_to_student:
          title: teacher_to_student
          description: 教师向学员发送私信
          type: integer
          default: 1
      type: object
    setting.ugc:
      title: setting.ugc
      description: 全局UGC设定
      properties:
        ugc_review:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/setting.ugc_review'
        ugc_note:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/setting.ugc_note'
        ugc_thread:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/setting.ugc_thread'
        ugc_private_message:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/setting.ugc_private_message'
      type: object
    setting.task_learning_config:
      title: setting.task_learning_config
      description: 课程任务学习配置
      properties:
        non_focus_learning_video_play_rule:
          description: '非专注学习规则,auto_pause:自动暂停、no_action:无操作'
          type: string
          default: no_action
          enum:
            - auto_pause
            - no_action
        multiple_learn:
          description: 多开学习
          properties:
            multiple_learn_enable:
              description: 是否多开学习
              type: string
              default: 'off'
              enum:
                - 'on'
                - 'off'
            multiple_learn_kick_mode:
              description: 多开学习模式，kick_previous：踢掉上一个播放、reject_current：拒绝本次播放
              type: string
              default: kick_previous
              enum:
                - kick_previous
                - reject_current
          type: object
      type: object
    setting.user:
      title: setting.user
      description: 用户设置
      properties:
        auth:
          description: 用户账户相关
          properties:
            register_mode:
              description: 注册模式
              type: string
              default: email
            user_terms_enabled:
              description: 服务协议开关
              type: boolean
            privacy_policy_enabled:
              description: 隐私协议开关
              type: boolean
            nickname_enabled:
              description: '是否允许修改昵称,VERSION >= 21.3.6'
              type: boolean
          type: object
        login_bind:
          description: 第三方绑定信息
          properties:
            oauth_enabled:
              description: 是否开启OAuth
              type: boolean
            weibo_enabled:
              description: 微博开关
              type: boolean
            qq_enabled:
              description: QQ开关
              type: boolean
            weixinweb_enabled:
              description: 微信网页登录
              type: boolean
            weixinmob_enabled:
              description: 微信公众号登录
              type: boolean
          type: object
      type: object
    user.simple:
      title: user.simple
      description: Simple用户对象
      properties:
        id:
          description: 用户ID
          type: integer
        nickname:
          description: nickname
          type: string
        title:
          description: 头衔
          type: string
        uuid:
          description: 用户UUID
          type: string
        destroyed:
          description: 是都已注销，0|1
          type: integer
        avatar:
          description: 是都已注销，0|1
          properties:
            small:
              description: 小图
              type: string
            middle:
              description: 中图
              type: string
            large:
              description: 大图
              type: string
          type: integer
        weChatQrCode:
          description: 微信二维码地址
          type: string
      type: object
    user.public:
      title: user.public
      allOf:
        -
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/user.simple'
        -
          properties:
            about:
              description: 个人介绍
              type: string
            faceRegistered:
              description: 人脸识别是否录入（注册）0|1
              type: integer
          type: object
    user.authenticated:
      title: user.authenticated
      allOf:
        -
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/user.public'
        -
          properties:
            email:
              description: 邮箱
              type: string
            locale:
              description: 语言：zh_CN|en
              type: string
            uri:
              description: '-'
              type: string
            type:
              description: 注册类型
              type: string
            roles:
              description: 用户角色（组）
              type: array
              items: {  }
            promotedSeq:
              description: ''
            locked:
              description: ''
            currentIp:
              description: ''
              type: string
            gender:
              description: ''
            iam:
              description: ''
            city:
              description: ''
              type: string
            qq:
              description: ''
              type: string
            signature:
              description: ''
            company:
              description: ''
              type: string
            job:
              description: ''
              type: string
            school:
              description: ''
              type: string
            class:
              description: ''
            weibo:
              description: ''
              type: string
            weixin:
              description: ''
              type: string
            isQQPublic:
              description: ''
            isWeixinPublic:
              description: ''
            isWeiboPublic:
              description: ''
            following:
              description: ''
            follower:
              description: ''
            verifiedMobile:
              description: ''
            promotedTime:
              description: ''
            lastPasswordFailTime:
              description: ''
            loginTime:
              description: ''
            approvalTime:
              description: ''
            vip:
              description: ''
            token:
              description: ''
            havePayPassword:
              description: ''
            fingerPrintSetting:
              description: ''
          type: object
    common.paging:
      title: common.paging
      description: 公共分页paging
      properties:
        total:
          type: integer
          default: 0
        offset:
          type: integer
          default: 0
        limit:
          type: integer
          default: 10
      type: object
tags:
  -
    name: setting
    description: 系统设置接口集合
  -
    name: course
    description: 课程接口集合
  -
    name: user
    description: 用户接口集合

Error: parse: parse spec: parse components: schemas: "setting.signSecurity": parse schema: property "clients": at 1:3068: parse default: unexpected default "null" value
